attributes.action: call for a general election after he (Tony Blair) resigns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should Gordon Brown inherit the job as Prime Minister? We, the voters, voted for Tony Blair's direction in which he wanted to take the country. 

Gordon Brown will obviously take the country in a different direction to Blair. The people should be given a say whether they want to back Gordon's plans and strategies. 

The job of Prime Minister should NOT be passed to someone the public have not approved to do the job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
